definition: namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near
to pay/to hand over to/classifier for pairs or sets of things

sentences.english: Many e-meeting sites have a Pay-As-You-Go approach.
sentences.chinese: 許多電子會議站點都使用即付即用模式。

sentences.english: In Pay-As-You-Go Collaboration people access services as needed.
sentences.chinese: 在即付即用協作中，人們根據需要訪問服務。

sentences.english: The catalogue will be posted if you send away for.
The documentary requirements specified in demand guarantees vary widely.
sentences.chinese: 見索即付保函規定的單據要求差別很大。

sentences.english: Users like the convenience and utilitarian nature of Pay-As-You-Go.
sentences.chinese: 用戶喜歡即付即用模式的便捷性。

sentences.english: Article ticket on demand of the bill .
sentences.chinese: 第十條憑票即付之匯票。

sentences.english: A bill of exchange that is payable on demand or within a very short time.
sentences.chinese: 指見票或在很短時間內即付的票據。

sentences.english: All bills that are paid promptly will be discounted at three percent.
sentences.chinese: 對所有即付的賬單都將打去3%的折扣。

sentences.english: At the other end is the guarantee which requires presentation of a judgment or arbitral award.
sentences.chinese: 有的見索即付保函則要求提交判決或者盅倜裁決。

definition: to pay a sum of money/payment
to settle a bill/to close an account
to refuse to accept a payment/to refuse to pay/to stop (a check or payment)
to be reimbursed for actual expenses
bill of warrant (certificate, allowing one to collect money or valuables)
